column4: Is there a reason that my router is not seeing my ubuntu box on the network and is not giving it an ip address such as 192.168.1.XXX?
Is there a reason that my router is not seeing my ubuntu box on the network and is not giving it an ip address such as 192.168.1.XXX?
ifconfig | grep Bcast | awk '{print $2}' | sed 's/addr://' will get the ip
